!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Jan 10, 2003 12:22:49.156
Why did you change this from ASSIGNED to NEW?

I thought it wasn't assigned because "assigned to" was still showing Platform-
Core-Inbox.

Bugs assigned to the inbox user are considered real bug but no one is currently
working on them. We are considering changing this in the future to be something
similar to what the SWT team does. In the meantime, details on the Core team bug
report organization can be found here:

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-core-home/documents/core_overview.html#bugs

Consolidating indexed store bugs
